In Google Cloud Platform, if you have installed the Cloud SDK data tool, then which of the following components are installed by default:

  1. Default gcloud CLI Commands
  2. BigQuery Command-Line tool
  3. Cloud Storage Command-Line tool
  4. Cloud SDK core libraries

In Google Cloud Platform, you are scripting the gcloud CLI commands with the Cloud SDK data tool. Which of the following statements aboutÂ implementing the Service Account Authorization technique are correct in this scenario:

  1. This technique is recommended if the user is deploying a script or automation methods across multiple machines in a production environment.
  2. This technique is recommended if the user is deploying a script or automation methods on a single machine.
  3. This technique is recommended if the user is running the gcloud CLI commands on a Google Compute Engine virtual machine instance where all the users have access to the root.
